name: Vector (itch) (CyberCheese69)
description:
[Very WIP] A movement-based action game with parkour elements.

CONTROLS:
WASD - standard movement
Shift - running (turns into sprinting after holding the key for 5+ secs)
Space - jump (click again in air to double jump, hold key for longer airtime)
:
Ctrl - let go of the edge and fall
Space when looking forward - climb
Space when looking back - jump off

Run and jump alongside walls to wallrun

E - pick up weapon

(fighting is not implemented yet, we want to refine it ;)
To exit you have to Alt+F4 or Alt+Tab and close the window
